event_box.name: Frog Reward Box
event_box.desc: Use Arena Coins to pull a random ^c0DFFDual Epic^cFFFF Frog card from Reward Set or an Arena Trophy! Each pull also grants ^cE7FFSneggle Stones^cFFFF!
event_box.help_desc: Each pull has 75% chance of granting a card, 25% chance of granting an Arena Trophy. Each pull also grants between 1-4 Champion Stones!
